comments.body: should we just convert this to use AnsibleAWSModule with module.fail_json_aws ?
This PR is a smallish bugfix, so I didn't want to introduce the full switch. Converting to AnsibleAWSModule is on the list though :+1:

This way it's a bit more elegant:
```yaml
tags['Name'] = tags.get('Name') or module.params.get('name')
```
